keywords: Blessing and honor, glory and power Ancient of Days

verse.name: v1
lines: Every tongue in heaven and earth,
Every knee shall bow at your throne,
You will be exalted Oh God,
and your kingdom, shall not pass away,

verse.name: v2
lines: Blessing and honor, glory and power
Be unto the Ancient of Days
From every nation, all of creation
Bow before the Ancient of Days

verse.name: v3
lines: Your kingdom shall reign over all the earth
Sing unto the Ancient of Days
For none can compare to your matchless worth
Sing to the Ancient of Days
